title: WEDNESDAY 6/30 - RAMS READY TO TAKE NEXT STEP WITH STAFFORD?
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY 6/30 - RAMS READY TO TAKE NEXT STEP WITH STAFFORD?
description:
Are the Rams ready to take the next step with Matthew Stafford? HOF wide receiver Isaac Bruce says yes... Patriots CB Stephon Gilmore still a potential training camp holdout.. Plus, Falcons TE Kyle Pitts signs his rookie contract..
